pr_title: [BEAM-2530] Sql precommit compile and run on java 11

timeline.message: [BEAM-2530] Sql precommit compile and run on java 11

timeline.bodyText: timeoutMins parameter is missing. I wonder if we should add it, just like in Dataflow examples: #11659
timeline.author: kamilwu
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,54 @@
+/*

+ * or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file

+ * to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the

+ * distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+ * WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+ * See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+ * limitations under the License.
+ */
+
+import PrecommitJobBuilder
+import CommonJobProperties as properties
+
+PrecommitJobBuilder builder = new PrecommitJobBuilder(
+        scope: this,
+        nameBase: 'SQL_Java11',
+        gradleTask: ':sqlPreCommit',
+        gradleSwitches: [
+                '-PdisableSpotlessCheck=true',
+                '-PcompileAndRunTestsWithJava11',
+                "-Pjava11Home=${properties.JAVA_11_HOME}"
+        ], // spotless checked in job_PreCommit_Spotless
+        triggerPathPatterns: [
+                '^sdks/java/extensions/sql.*$',
+        ]
